Text:
in a decade+ of downloading windows operating systems i've downloaded a trial or fake.
The concept is simple.
AVOID
ALL
CUSTOM
CRAP
POSTED
period -> .

Look for a disc image that has been verified authentic and that came from microsoft directly. Such as downloads that originated from MSDN.

It's going to be almost impossible to tell what someone has done to the disc image and rolling the dice with your operating system is about the worst thing that can be done with a pc.

No offence uploader i'm sure you mean well but training people with bad habits is not smart..

search TPB with this keyword and you will find safe downloads with far more than 2 seeds ;)
